scripts.clear:server: cd server && rimraf public dist && cd ..
scripts.build:client: cd client && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.build:client-prod: cd client && npm run build:prod && cd ..
scripts.build:server: cd server && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.start:dev: npm run clear:client && npm run clear:server && npm run build:client && npm run build:server && npm run copy:public && npm run start:server
scripts.start:prod: npm run build:client-prod && npm run build:server && npm run copy:public && npm run start:server-prod
